pages.text: Beset by smouldering tendrils of flame-coloured growth, this bulb is purported by some to grow into an even more powerful plant.$(br2)Such a specimen has yet to be observed or be recorded.$(br2)Once found amongst volcanoes and in hellish landscapes, it can now be crafted through the heat of a $(l:crafting/pyres)pyre$() and is $(l:herbs/infernal_bulb#renew)renewable$().

pages.title: Renewability
pages.text: Only able to be grown on one of the five variants of $(l:resources/elemental_soil)elemental soil$(), the bulb itself propagates into an extravagant blossom when mature, which yields yet more bulbs.$(br2)$(info) It is not necessary to match the element of the herb with the element of the soil, and it will grow on any variant.
